topic.title: [NSFW] LoliTube - Youtube for Lolis
topic.body:
Hello fellow pervs! I made a new IPFS video site. This time for loli hentai. 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CmDyfVXZvUGFfY6cUQagCpkqzazSsBdaP/

You will need to have the IPFS daemon running to be able to watch the videos. Let me know about a loli hentai series you want added. :D

2_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp.body:
> [oo7o6y](#comment_2_1AdwBQjEYfBQhVGaAjF5X3y2UfvBxS4BCr): very difficult understand how to install and run on windows. Could you make video how step by step install and use?

Do you mean IPFS? You download the executable from their website and then run it using your terminal or command prompt.

4_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp.body:
> [nextbit](#comment_1_1Mzjg3DjFFiUBz42zZa9w9oM2Lf4vHeLK3): The port is wrong in the url, try this: http://127.0.0.1:43110/16pz3DbSRyz7D7e3qsxWMq98Z8VztJZN4j/videoss.html

Ops. My bad. Ya zeronet's default is 43110, missed the zero.

18_1P8VJL2iKWfUB4hqQkrFdXCbC8RrimAZoZ.body:
Ethereum and Zeronet should not even be compared. They are two different technologies for different purposes.  Whoever wrote this clearly doesn't understand either of them. 

To give a little insight. Ethereum is a blockchain-based distributed computing platform. Zeronet is a peer-to-peer decentralized internet platform. Comparing the two is like comparing HTTP to DHT. Ya they are both protocols but they serve different purposes.
